nodes.text: New Alliance, Old Enemies is a Star Wars Miniatures adventure by Sterling Hershey written in 2008. It featured Kyle Katarn fighting against the Yuuzhan Vong.

Deep in the Yuuzhan Vong War, the alien invaders attacked a small outpost on a minor planet near the Imperial Remnant. The initial assault devastated the facility, leavingfew survivors. The Yuuzhan Vong then dispatched a small but lethal force headed by a Jedi hunter and aided by a member of the Peace Brigade in order to draw out Jedi Master Kyle Katarn and prevent the site from gathering intelligence.
The Master arrived and aided the survivors while the Vong force attack the site while the technician escapes.
